name: Circuit Suburbs
description:
Circuit Suburbs is a submission to the February 2, 2021 Mini Jam 73. The theme for the jam is Power and the Limitation is no more than 5 colors.

Welcome to Circuit Suburbs. To win you must build a computer one hex at a time. Balance power, cooling, CPUs and RAM to create a fast computer. As your score increases you can compare your creation against computers of yesteryear.

The music is Drive Time by Moustro.

* Note: This is a game, the computer analogy falls flat on its face after you place the first hex. Play, enjoy and see how far you can make it through the decades!
